00060 void Schema_Adams_Moulton_base::associer_pb(const Probleme_base& un_probleme)
00061 {
00062   Schema_Implicite_Multi_TimeStep_base::associer_pb(un_probleme);
00063 // Loop on equations
00064   for (int i=0; i<pb_base().nombre_d_equations(); i++)
00065     pb_base().equation(i).set_calculate_time_derivative(1);
00066 }
00067 
00068 double Schema_Adams_Moulton_base::changer_temps(Equation_base& eqn, const double& temps)
00069 {
00070   eqn.inconnue().valeur().Champ_base::changer_temps(temps);
00071   eqn.derivee_en_temps().valeur().Champ_base::changer_temps(temps);
00072   return temps;
00073 }
00074 
00075 void Schema_Adams_Moulton_base::update_time_derivative(Equation_base& eqn, const DoubleTab& data)
00076 {
00077   DoubleTab& time_derivative = eqn.derivee_en_temps().futur();
00078   time_derivative = data;                                //here "data" is supposed to contain "vpoint" table
00079   modifier_second_membre_full_impl(eqn,time_derivative);
00080 }
00081 
00082 void Schema_Adams_Moulton_base::mettre_a_jour_equation(Equation_base& eqn, const double& temps)
00083 {
00084   eqn.inconnue().mettre_a_jour(temps);
00085   eqn.derivee_en_temps().mettre_a_jour(temps);
00086 }

00088 void Schema_Adams_Moulton_base::compute_coefficients(double time_step, const DoubleTab& times) const
00089 {
00090   compute_adams_moulton_coefficients(time_step,times);
00091 }
00092 
00093 void Schema_Adams_Moulton_base::add_multi_timestep_data(const Equation_base& eqn, Matrice_Base& mat_morse, DoubleTab& secmem) const
00094 {
00095   Equation_base& eqn_bis         = ref_cast_non_const(Equation_base,eqn);
00096   double time_step               = pas_de_temps();
00097   double effective_time_step     = -1.;
00098   double scaling                 = -1.;
00099 
00100 // Remark for "pen" interger : we do not penalize matrices and right members even in the case
00101 // of Dirichlet or Symetrie boundary conditions
00102   int pen    = 0;
00103   int offset = 0;
00104   int i      = 0;
00105 
00106   effective_time_step     = coefficients()[nb_valeurs_passees()+1] * time_step;
00107   scaling                 = 1./coefficients()[nb_valeurs_passees()+1];
00108 
00109 // Modification due to pressure gradient
00110   DoubleTab correction(eqn.inconnue().valeurs());
00111 
00112   correction = 0.;
00113   eqn_bis.corriger_derivee_expl(correction);
00114   correction *= (scaling-1.);
00115   secmem     += correction;
00116 
00117 // Modification due to present time and past times
00118   DoubleTab dudt(eqn.inconnue().passe(1)); //due to Initialiser_Champs() offset
00119   DoubleTab tmp(dudt);
00120 
00121   for (i=0; i<nb_valeurs_passees()+1; ++i)
00122     {
00123       offset  = nb_valeurs_passees()-i; //present time if offset==0 else past times
00124       tmp     = eqn.derivee_en_temps().passe(offset);
00125       tmp    *= coefficients()[i] * time_step;
00126       dudt   += tmp;
00127     }
00128 
00129   eqn.solv_masse().ajouter_masse(effective_time_step,secmem,dudt,pen);
00130   eqn.solv_masse().ajouter_masse(effective_time_step,mat_morse,pen);
00131 }
00132 
00133 // To get du/dt table without pressure gradient and influences of past and present times
00134 void Schema_Adams_Moulton_base::modifier_second_membre_full_impl(const Equation_base& eqn, DoubleTab& secmem)
00135 {
00136   Equation_base& eqn_bis = ref_cast_non_const(Equation_base,eqn);
00137 
00138   DoubleTab correction(secmem);
00139   correction=0.;
00140   eqn_bis.corriger_derivee_expl(correction);
00141   eqn.solv_masse().appliquer(correction);
00142   secmem-=correction; //on enleve le gradient de pression
00143 
00144   if (nb_pas_dt()>nb_pas_dt_seuil())
00145     {
00146       int i = 0;
00147       int offset = 0;
00148       double scaling = 1./coefficients()[nb_valeurs_passees()+1];
00149 
00150       for (i=0; i<nb_valeurs_passees()+1; ++i )
00151         {
00152           offset      = nb_valeurs_passees() - i;
00153           correction  = eqn.derivee_en_temps().passe(offset);//present time if i==nb_valeurs_passees() else past times
00154           correction *= coefficients()[i];
00155           secmem     -= correction;
00156         }
00157 
00158       secmem *= scaling;
00159     }
00160 }
